PyAutoExcel.ParserInterface2.Field module

class PyAutoExcel.ParserInterface2.Field.Field(name: str, validator: BaseValidator, required: bool = False, default: Any | None = None)

Bases: object

Represents a field in a form.

Parameters:

  • name – The name of the field.

  • validator – The validator for the field.

  • required – Whether the field is required.

  • default – The default value for the field.

get()

Gets the value of the field.

Returns:

The value of the field.

name: str
set(value)

Sets the value of the field.

Parameters:

value – The value to set.

Raises:

ValidationError – If the value is invalid.

validator: BaseValidator
value: Any

Bases: object

Parser class.

Parameters:

  • params (dict) – dict of parameters.

  • target (type) – class of the object to be parsed.

  • fields (list[Field]) – list of fields to be parsed.

parse(*args, **kwargs)

Parse the parameters and return an instance of the target class.

instance of the target class.

PyAutoExcel.ParserInterface2.Validators module

class PyAutoExcel.ParserInterface2.Validators.BaseValidator

Bases: ABC

Base class for validators.

Subclasses should implement the validate method.

abstract validate(data)

Validate the given data.

Parameters:

data – The data to validate.

Raises:

ValueError – If the data is invalid.
